activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kenneth C Shorey

records.addlTxt:
8:58 AM Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Kenneth C Shorey.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

8:58  Court relates and gives appearances.
8:59  Defense acknowledges receipt of Information and waives further reading of the same.  NG pleas entered to Counts 3, 4 and 5 of Informaiton.
9:00  Court questions Atty. Erdman.
9:00  Atty. Erdman relates and asks for status hearing.  
Status hearing set; must appear in person.

Bond to continue.
Status hearing scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Arraignment on November 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.

11:48 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared in court for Kenneth C Shorey. 
11:49 a.m. Detective Michael Carroll with the Barron County Sheriffs Dept called and sworn.  Direct by State.  11:56 a.m. Cross by Attorney Erdman.  Court relates, finds probable cause, and binds over for trial.   Arraignment set and Defendant must appear in person unless there isn't a resolution, then the Court will consider a video appearance due to Defendant living out of State.  Bond continues.  Defendant confirms address and updates phone number.
Arraignment scheduled for November 4, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 19, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:38 AM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Kenneth C Shorey.  Reading waived, preliminary investigation requested. DE requests to appear by zoom.  Court relates evidentiary hearings must be held in person. Court relates DE must try to appear in person, but if he absolutely cannot make it, must appear by Zoom Video and must notify judicial assistant.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Michelle Erdman
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report
Bail/Bond Receipt from BC Jail

10:10 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright  in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Kenneth C Shorey in court, in custody.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin appeared by video. 
Attorney Steurer from the public defenders office appeared by zoom video and relates an  Attorney has not been found yet.  
Court finds good cause to adjourn.   Defendant requests a bond modification.  Court relates this is a Judge Boyle file and bond was set by her.  DA Wright relates to the court missed court appearances in Minnesota.  
Court denies the motion to amend the bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

1:06 PM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Kenneth C Shorey. 
Counsel has not yet been appointed to represent the defendant. Bond motion from cash bond to signature bond. State objects to modification. Court reviews complaint, relates and denies the motion.

10:02 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video, in custody. 
Public Defender's office has not appointed attorney. Court finds good cause for adjournment. Defendant requests signature bond or reduction. State objects.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

10:21 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video, in custody. 
No counsel has been appointed yet. Court finds good cause for the adjournment. Reset. 

CC: BC Jail
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 4, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report
Denied - Qualifies for SPD representation.

records.addlTxt:
10:10 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video, in custody.
Qualifies for Public Defender. Court finds good cause for adjournment.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Kenneth C Shorey
Current: 105 E 91st Street, Bloomington, MN 55420 United States  (Effective: 04-15-2022)
Prior: 105 E 92nd Street, Bloomington, MN 55420 United States

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:02 PM Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Kenneth C Shorey appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow appeared by video for Kenneth C Shorey for today.
Defendant needs to contact Public Defender's office. Jail provides blue form to Defendant and Court instructs Defendant to complete it today and turn it into the Clerk of Court office. State requests cash bond. 1:08 Attorney Rockow and Defendant put in a break out room 1:12 Attorney Rockow requests high signature bond 1:13 Court sets cash bond. Next appearance before Judge Babler.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
